text: Stefon Marsean Diggs (born November 29, 1993) is an American football wide receiver for the Buffalo Bills of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Maryland. He was drafted by the Minnesota Vikings in the fifth round of the 2015 NFL Draft. title: Stefon Diggs
